pullRequest.title: Fixes accidental parse fail when trace ID is padded right
pullRequest.bodyText:
Padding the right side of the trace ID with zeros is bad practice, but
it should be permitted. This changes the code and tests to ensure we
don't accidentally fail.

commit.message:
Fixes accidental parse fail when trace ID is padded right

Padding the right side of the trace ID with zeros is bad practice, but
it should be permitted. This changes the code and tests to ensure we
don't accidentally fail.

nodes.bodyText: later, we could consider sneaky sharing between b3 single format and here, as the parsing requirements are similar

commit.message: ensures logging when using builder (b3 multi uses this)
